name: MTLAccelerationStructureGeometryDescriptor
desc: A base class for descriptors that contain geometry data to convert into a ray-tracing acceleration structure.

items.name: var label: String?
items.desc: A label for the geometry structure, suitable for debugging.

items.name: var intersectionFunctionTableOffset: Int
items.desc: An index into the intersection table for determining which intersection function Metal calls when it intersects a ray with the acceleration structure.

items.name: var opaque: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the geometry data in the acceleration structure needs to skip triangle-intersection tests.

items.name: var allowDuplicateIntersectionFunctionInvocation: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether Metal calls the ray-intersection test more than once per primitive on the structure.
